snippet.title: Amber Heard Wears Cutaway Gown at Glamour Women Of The Year Awards
snippet.description:
Amber Heard wears cutaway gown at Glamour Women Of The Year Awards

She has been slowly making her way back into the limelight after her divorce from Johnny Depp. 

And on Monday Amber Heard looked to have, for now, place the incident behind her as she attended the Glamour Women Of The Year Awards in Hollywood.

The 30-year-old looked gorgeous as ever while posing on the red carpet.

The gorgeous blonde showcased her figure in a soft pink and lace gown.
The stunning frock featured a cutaway design that showcased the star's cleavage and creamy shoulders. 
The beauty's outing comes as she winds down a tumultuous year from her messy split from the 53-year-old A-list actor.

Her divorce dominated entertainment headlines this past summer amid allegations of verbal and physical abuse aimed at the Edward Scissorhands star.
Amber began dating Johnny after sparks flew between the two on the set of 2011's The Rum Diary and married in February 2015.
She initially accused the Oscar nominee of committing acts that amounted to 'excessive emotional, verbal and physical abuse' against her in a May and pushed for a restraining order, but later recanted the claims when the two agreed to a divorce settlement in August.

The former couple said in a joint statement upon the pact that 'there never any intent of physical or emotional harm' on either's behalf, and that neither had 'made false accusations for financial gain.'
'Our relationship was intensely passionate and at times volatile,' the two said, 'but always bound by love.'
